sentence: Others running in the race include former Ohio treasurer and two-time Senate candidate Josh Mandel; former Ohio GOP Chair Jane Timken; Cleveland businessman and luxury auto dealership giant Bernie Moreno; 2018 Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons, a Cleveland entrepreneur, real estate developer, and investment banker; and Matt Dolan, a longtime state lawmaker whose family owns Major League Baseball’s Cleveland Guardians.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: JD Vance massively triggers left with glowing MTG endorsement, vow to take country back from ‘scumbags’

sentence: Former Ohio Republican Party Chair Jane Timken, also running in the Senate primary, echoed Vance’s verdict, calling the event “embarrassing.” Matt Dolan, another GOP candidate, said Ohio voters deserved better.
author: Rick Moran
title: Watch: GOP Ohio Senate Race Heats Up With Near On-Stage Brawl Between Gibbons and Mandel

sentence: Vance has been locked in a heated race against former state treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons, former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken, and state Sen. Matt Dolan, whose family owns the Cleveland Guardians.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in US Senate primary in Ohio
